__TOC__

=== Promotion Team ===
There has been an Ubuntu Jam in the city of Nijmegen and on the island of Texel. Thanks to Rachid and Timo, the organisers.

=== Forum Team ===
We've had to say goodbye to Nunslaugher as administrator of the forum.
Ron has returned as moderator.

=== Administration Team ===
Nothing special outside regular maintenance.

=== Webteam ===
The merger between the webteam and the news team has finished.
Dooitze has started a news page (see [http://ubuntu-nl.org/node/137]).
The website has been updated to 12.04.1, including the iso images provided by Redmar from the translation team.
